title: Grecco Auto Service Center - HOME OF THE $59 TIRE OFFER
text: Grecco Auto Service Center - HOME OF THE $59 TIRE OFFER , 15 October 2015 -- 1888PressRelease - Winter is just around the corner! Don't miss the HUGE savings on Grecco's $59 tire deal! Stop in and see us TODAY!Newark, NJ - Did you hear the news? Grecco Auto Service Center is now offering INCREDIBLE savings when you purchase your tires from us! We are now the HOME OF THE $59 Tire offer! We carry all tire sizes for all makes and models! Interested in more details? Stop by today! We are conveniently located at; 418 Rt. 46, Rockaway, NJ 07866. Don't overpay at another store! For all your maintenance needs get down to the Grecco Auto Service Center today! You can visit us any time online at http://www.greccoauto.com/service-parts-specials.aspx! Offer includes OHTSU Tires. Rated 91v, Size 205x55x16. Most sizes offered at similar savings. Other restrictions may apply, see dealer for complete details. Grecco Auto Service Center is proud of our motto, "The Family Reputation You Can Trust," because when you are looking for a new Honda car, truck, or SUV, we will treat you like you are one of our own. We take the hassle out of negotiations by offering you low pricing and fantastic deals from the start, because we want you to know we are as dependable and reliable as a new Honda vehicle itself. Celebrating our 50th anniversary is not only a milestone, it is a testament to our dedication to our Denville and New Jersey customers who are looking for a Honda dealership they can count on for sales and service needs. Our inventory is second to none, because we know our customers have different tastes and needs when it comes to the Honda vehicle they desire. So head on over to Joyce Honda today so you can see why we make the car buying process painless and maybe even prosperous!
